00020 
00021 # Live updates for obdgpslogger via google earth
00022 
00023 # This works in three stages:
00024 #  Stage 0: Present UI and options in HTML. Submitting triggers Stage 1
00025 #  Stage 1: Download seed KML containing options and link to stage 2
00026 #  Stage 2: Actual KML
00027 
00028 
00029 # Borrows code from http://code.google.com/apis/kml/articles/phpmysqlkml.html
00030 #   to create kml
00031 
00032 include_once("styles.php");
00033 include_once("seedgauge.php");
00034 
00035 # Length in seconds of sample to output
00036 $samplelength = 10;
00037 if(!empty($_REQUEST['samplelength'])) {
00038     $samplelength = (int)$_REQUEST['samplelength'];
00039 }
00040 
00041 # Target mpg
00042 $targetmpg = 20;
00043 if(!empty($_REQUEST['targetmpg'])) {
00044     $targetmpg = (int)$_REQUEST['targetmpg'];
00045 }
00046 
00047 # Time to go back [from now]
00048 $startdelta = 10;
00049 if(!empty($_REQUEST['startdelta'])) {
00050     $startdelta = (int)$_REQUEST['startdelta'];
00051 
00052     # If they request "current", make sure it matches the sample length
00053     if(-1 == $startdelta) {
00054         $startdelta = $samplelength;
00055     }
00056 }
00057 
00058 # Update frequency
00059 $updaterate = 4;
00060 if(!empty($_REQUEST['updaterate'])) {
00061     $updaterate = (int)$_REQUEST['updaterate'];
00062 }
00063 
00064 # Database filename
00065 $dbfilename = "ces2010.db";
00066 if(!empty($_REQUEST['dbfilename'])) {
00067     $dbfilename = $_REQUEST['dbfilename'];
00068 }
00069 
00070 # Debug mode. Mostly just changes the content-type so the browser will render.
00071 $debug = 0;
00072 if(!empty($_REQUEST['debug']) && 1 == $_REQUEST['debug']) {
00073     $debug = 1;
00074 }
00075 
00076 # Internal prefix on styles. Mainly a uniquefying thing
00077 $styleprefix = "LiveOBDKMLStyle";
00078 
00079 # Number of different colors to allow
00080 $stylecount = 2;
00081 
00082 # Stage 0: UI of options
00083 function stage0() {
00084     global $samplelength, $startdelta, $dbfilename, $targetmpg, $styleprefix;
00085 
00086     # Yay magic numbers. This is the first time in the ces2010 db
00087     $ces2010start = time() - 1262889649;
00088 
00089     print <<< EOF
00090 
00091     <HTML>
00092     <HEAD><TITLE>Launch OBDGPSlogger Live</TITLE></HEAD><BODY>
00093     <H1>Launch OBDGPSlogger Live</H1>
00094     <FORM METHOD="GET">
00095     <INPUT TYPE="hidden" NAME="stage" VALUE="1">
00096     <TABLE>
00097     <TR><TD>Target MPG</TD><TD><INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="targetmpg" VALUE="$targetmpg"></TD></TR>
00098     <TR><TD>Sample Length (Seconds)</TD><TD><INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="samplelength" VALUE="$samplelength"></TD></TR>
00099     <TR><TD>Start Time</TD><TD>
00100         <SELECT NAME="startdelta">
00101             <OPTION VALUE="-1">Live Data</option>
00102             <OPTION VALUE="$ces2010start" SELECTED>Start of ces2010.db</option>
00103         </SELECT>
00104     </TD></TR>
00105     <TR><TD>Update Rate</TD><TD>
00106         <SELECT NAME="updaterate">
00107             <OPTION VALUE="-1">Never</option>
00108             <OPTION VALUE="1" SELECTED>1 Second</option>
00109             <OPTION VALUE="2">2 Seconds</option>
00110             <OPTION VALUE="4">4 Seconds</option>
00111             <OPTION VALUE="8">8 Seconds</option>
00112             <OPTION VALUE="16">16 Seconds</option>
00113             <OPTION VALUE="32">32 Seconds</option>
00114         </SELECT>
00115     </TD></TR>
00116     <TR><TD>DB File</TD><TD><INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="dbfilename" VALUE="$dbfilename"></TD></TR>
00117     <TR><TD>Debug Mode</TD><TD><input type="checkbox" name="debug" value="1" /></TD></TR>
00118     <TR><TD><INPUT TYPE="Submit"></TD></TR>
00119     </FORM>
00120 EOF;
00121 
00122     print <<< EOF
00123 
00124     </BODY></HTML>
00125 EOF;
00126 }
00127 
00128 # Stage 1: Seed KML to open in Google Earth
00129 function stage1() {
00130     global $samplelength, $startdelta, $dbfilename, $updaterate, $targetmpg, $styleprefix;
00131 
00132     global $debug;
00133     if($debug) {
00134         header('Content-type: text/plain');
00135     } else {
00136         header('Content-type: application/vnd.google-earth.kml+xml');
00137         header('Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=liveobdseed.kml');
00138     }
00139 
00140     $url = "http://" . $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'] . filter_var($_SERVER['PHP_SELF'], FILTER_SANITIZE_STRING) .
00141         "?startdelta=$startdelta" . "&" .
00142         "samplelength=$samplelength" . "&" .
00143         "dbfilename=$dbfilename" . "&" .
00144         "targetmpg=$targetmpg" . "&" .
00145         "debug=$debug" . "&" .
00146         "stage=2";
00147 
00148     print <<< EOF
00149     <kml xmlns="http://www.opengis.net/kml/2.2">
00150         <NetworkLink>
00151                 <name>OBDGPSLogger network link</name>
00152                 <description>Showing live data from OBDGPSLogger, pulled from logfile $dbfilename</description>
00153                 <Link>
00154                 <href><![CDATA[
00155                 $url
00156                 ]]></href>
00157 EOF;
00158 
00159     if($updaterate > 0) {
00160         print <<< EOF
00161                     <refreshMode>onInterval</refreshMode>
00162                     <refreshInterval>$updaterate</refreshInterval>
00163 EOF;
00164     }
00165     print <<< EOF
00166             </Link>
00167         </NetworkLink>
00168     </kml>
00169 EOF;
00170     exit(0);
00171 
00172 }
00173 
00174 # Stage 2: Actual kml data
00175 function stage2() {
00176     global $samplelength, $startdelta, $dbfilename, $targetmpg, $styleprefix, $stylecount;
00177 
00178     global $debug;
00179 
00180     $db = new PDO("sqlite:$dbfilename");
00181     if(!$db) {
00182         print("Error opening database $dbfilename\n");
00183         exit(1);
00184     }
00185 
00186 
00187     $sql = "SELECT gps.lat AS lat,gps.lon AS lon,obd.vss AS vss,(7.107 * obd.vss/obd.maf) AS mpg " .
00188         "FROM gps LEFT JOIN obd ON gps.time=obd.time " .
00189         "WHERE gps.time >= :starttime " .
00190         "AND gps.time <= :endtime";
00191 
00192     $stmt = $db->prepare($sql);
00193     if(!$stmt) {
00194         header("Content-type: text/plain");
00195         print("Couldn't prepare statement\n$sql\n");
00196         print_r($db->errorInfo());
00197         exit(1);
00198     }
00199 
00200     $starttime = time() - $startdelta;
00201     $endtime = $starttime + $samplelength;
00202     $stmt->execute(array(':starttime' => $starttime, ':endtime' => $endtime));
00203     
00204 
00205     // Creates the Document.
00206     $dom = new DOMDocument('1.0', 'UTF-8');
00207 
00208     // Creates the root KML element and appends it to the root document.
00209     $node = $dom->createElementNS('http://earth.google.com/kml/2.2', 'kml');
00210     $parNode = $dom->appendChild($node);
00211 
00212     // Creates a KML Document element and append it to the KML element.
00213     $dnode = $dom->createElement('Document');
00214     $dnode->setAttribute('id', 'livegpspos');
00215     $docNode = $parNode->appendChild($dnode);
00216 
00217     $docNameNode = $dom->createElement('name', 'OBDGPSLogger live updates');
00218     $dnode->appendChild($docNameNode);
00219 
00220     $docStyleNode = $dom->createElement('Style');
00221     $docStyleNode->setAttribute('id', 'hidechildren');
00222     $dnode->appendChild($docStyleNode);
00223 
00224     $listStyleNode = $dom->createElement('ListStyle');
00225     $docStyleNode->appendChild($listStyleNode);
00226 
00227     $hideChildNode = $dom->createElement('listItemType', 'checkHideChildren');
00228     $listStyleNode->appendChild($hideChildNode);
00229     $gaugesnode = $dom->createElement('Folder');
00230     $nameNode = $dom->createElement('name', 'Gauges');
00231     $gaugesnode->appendChild($nameNode);
00232     $dnode->appendChild($gaugesnode);
00233 
00234     // All the gauges
00235     $gaugedelta = time() - $endtime;
00236     seedGaugeKML($dom, $gaugesnode, $endtime, $debug, $gaugedelta, $dbfilename, "vss", "Vehicle Speed", 0, 255, 0, 1, 0, 1);
00237     seedGaugeKML($dom, $gaugesnode, $endtime, $debug, $gaugedelta, $dbfilename, "rpm", "RPM", 0, 8000, 0, 0.8, 0, 0.8);
00238     seedGaugeKML($dom, $gaugesnode, $endtime, $debug, $gaugedelta, $dbfilename, "throttlepos", "Throttle Position", 0, 100, 0, 0.6, 0, 0.6);
00239 
00240 
00241     // Human friendly name for the trace
00242     $plotNode = $dom->createElement('Folder');
00243     $dnode->appendChild($plotNode);
00244 
00245     // Set up the styles we need
00246     planStyles($stylecount, $styleprefix, $dom, $plotNode);
00247 
00248     $nameNode = $dom->createElement('name', "Height=>speed, color=>mpg");
00249     $plotNode->appendChild($nameNode);
00250 
00251     $plotStyleNode = $dom->createElement('styleUrl', 'hidechildren');
00252     $plotNode->appendChild($plotStyleNode);
00253 
00254 
00255     $coorStr = "";
00256     $mpg = -1;
00257     $currstyle = "";
00258     $laststyle = "";
00259     $lastlon = $lastlat = 0;
00260     while(false != ($row = $stmt->fetch(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC))) {
00261         if($lastlon == $row['lon'] && $lastlat == $row['lat']) {
00262             continue;
00263         }
00264         $lastlon = $row['lon'];
00265         $lastlat = $row['lat'];
00266 
00267 
00268         // Creates a coordinates element and gives it the value of the lng and lat columns from the results.
00269         $coorStr .= $row['lon'] . ',' . $row['lat'] . ',' . $row['vss'] . "\n";
00270 
00271         $mpg = $row['mpg'];
00272 
00273         # print $mpg . "\n";
00274         if($mpg >= $targetmpg) {
00275             $currstyle = $styleprefix . 'Green';
00276         } else {
00277             $currstyle = $styleprefix . 'Red';
00278         }
00279 
00280         if($laststyle != $currstyle && "" != $currstyle) {
00281             renderLineString($dom, $plotNode, $coorStr, $laststyle);
00282             $coorStr = $row['lon'] . ',' . $row['lat'] . ',' . $row['vss'] . "\n";
00283         }
00284         $laststyle = $currstyle;
00285     }
00286     renderLineString($dom, $plotNode, $coorStr, $currstyle);
00287 
00288     if($debug) {
00289         header('Content-type: text/plain');
00290     } else {
00291         header('Content-type: application/vnd.google-earth.kml+xml');
00292         header('Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=liveobd.kml');
00293     }
00294 
00295     $kmlOutput = $dom->saveXML();
00296     echo $kmlOutput;
00297 }
00298 
00299 $stage = 0;
00300 if(!empty($_REQUEST['stage'])) {
00301     $stage = (int)$_REQUEST['stage'];
00302 }
00303 
00304 switch($stage) {
00305     case 1:
00306         stage1();
00307         break;
00308     case 2:
00309         stage2();
00310         break;
00311     case 0:
00312     default:
00313         stage0();
00314         break;
00315 }
00316
